item.title: About....Bloody......Time...: Android - More Countries, More sellers, More buyers
item.description:
#“About….Bloody……Time…: Android - More Countries, More sellers, More buyers”

Since we launched Android and Android Market, we have seen the population of Android users and devices expand into many countries. This widespread adoption has brought with it growing interest in Android Markets support for the buying and selling of paid applications in these additional countries.

via android-developers.blogspot.com

Yay, Ireland is in the list. No more messing with UK SIMs.
